SEARCH
Package main.logic.model

Class Grid

java.lang.Object
main.logic.model.Grid
public class Grid extends Object
The Grid class represents a 2d grid.

  • Constructor Details

    • Grid

      public Grid()
      Constructor to create a Grid. Default is a 25 pixel side long square.

    • Grid

      public Grid(int s)
      Constructor to create a square Grid of side s.
      Parameters:
      s - Number of pixels on the side

    • Grid

      public Grid(int height, int width)
      Constructor to create a rectangular Grid.
      Parameters:
      height - Index of pixels high
      width - Index of pixels long

  • Method Details

    • getElement

      public Integer getElement(int i, int j) throws GridHeightException, GridWidthException
      Gets the element of the grid on line i and column j
      Parameters:
      i - Index of the chosen line
      j - Index of the chosen column
      Returns:
      Element at line i and column j
      Throws:
      GridHeightException - Raised when line i not in table
      GridWidthException - Raised when column j not in table

    • setElement

      public void setElement(int i, int j, int value) throws GridHeightException, GridWidthException
      Sets a new element in the grid on line i and column j
      Parameters:
      i - Index of the chosen line
      j - Index of the chosen column
      value - New element at line i and column j
      Throws:
      GridHeightException - Raised when line i not in table
      GridWidthException - Raised when column j not in table

    • getHeight

      public int getHeight()
      Get the number of lines of the grid
      Returns:
      Total number of lines of the grid

    • getWidth

      public int getWidth()
      Get the number of columns of the grid
      Returns:
      Total number of columns of the grid

    • getLine

      public ArrayList<Integer> getLine(int n) throws GridHeightException
      Gets the content of line n
      Parameters:
      n - Index of the chosen line
      Returns:
      Line number n
      Throws:
      GridHeightException - Raised when line i not in table

    • getColumn

      public ArrayList<Integer> getColumn(int n) throws GridWidthException
      Gets the content of column n
      Parameters:
      n - Index of the chosen column
      Returns:
      Column number n
      Throws:
      GridWidthException - Raised when column j not in table

    • setLine

      public void setLine(int i, ArrayList<Integer> value) throws GridHeightException
      Sets the content of line i
      Parameters:
      i - Index of the chosen line
      value - List of number to be put in the line
      Throws:
      GridHeightException - Raised when line i not in table

    • setColumn

      public void setColumn(int j, ArrayList<Integer> value) throws GridWidthException
      Sets the content of column j
      Parameters:
      j - Index of the chosen column
      value - List of number to be put in the column
      Throws:
      GridWidthException - Raised when column j not in table
